segments.text: Why do you look so gloomy ? What are you looking for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My dissertation . I put it somewhere last night and I can't find it now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you finish typing it yesterday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I kept on typing it until midnight , but it is lost .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry about it . It must be somewhere in your room . Let's see where you put it . Have you searched your drawers and the desk ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but there is nothing inside the drawers or on the desk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've searched everywhere . Where on earth did I put it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't get upset over it . At least you have another week to go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have been working on it for a whole month and it's too late to write another . Just think of all my hard work that goes for nothing . How could I do such a thing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cheer up ! What I meant was that you can find it sometime during a week . There is no need to write a new one . Oh , what's this ? Is this your dissertation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . Yes , that's it . Where did you find it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You â€™ Ve put it among these journals .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My poor memory . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2
